author: jpata
body:
#### PR description:
FP420 is no longer developed, the code is not maintained, and not runnable.
We got a confirmation neither CTPPS nor Proton want to pick up the maintenance.

Addresses https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36612.

#### PR validation:

Compiles.
title: Remove nonfunctional and unmaintained FP420 code
